title: Deep inference of latent dynamics with spatio-temporal super-resolution using selective backpropagation through time
abstract: LFADS models benefit from appropriate hyperparameter (HP) tuning, as optimal HP combinations can vary from dataset to dataset [2, 3]. As mentioned in the main text, we use AutoLFADS [3] to ensure appropriate HP tuning. The framework combines a regularization strategy (coordinated dropout; CD [2]) with a largescale framework for optimizing model hyperparameters (population-based training; PBT [4]). The details of these strategies are outlined in previous work; here we provide specifics for replicating our findings.
